page.title: 05MY TYPICAL SUNDAY IN PRESTON
page.content: My{Sunday}starts at about half past nine. I get up,get dressed and have breakfast.At about twenty past ten, me and my dad set off for St. Saviour with St.James'{Church.} We say hello to our friends and go inside to wait about 5 minutes for the service to start. After quarter of an hour all the {Sunday School}children go out to have a lesson,but the service continues. Sunday School is very interesting. After it,we have a coffee in the hall and people talk to each other. At half past eleven we have our dinner of a few sandwiches. I then usually spend my time{playing}with friends, or I help in the garden, or walk or read.Later my Grandparents visit us.When they've gone we have tea.I then play or watch T.V.When Mum says "Bed",I complain but get ready.
